name: Freedom Force vs. the 3rd Reich
description: Installs the GOG version of the game

files.installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG

script.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Freedom Force vs the 3rd Reich/ffvt3r.exe

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Freedom Force vs the 3rd Reich/ffvt3r.exe
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /SILENT /NOGUI /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
